1.1.name: wordpress/hyves-respect
1.1.description:
Automatically add hyves respect buttons to your posts. It works for single pages and loops. The plugin features an options page in which the following can be configured:

Display options:

  • Toggle hiding of respect button in loops

Display style:

  • Show post on top or bottom of post
  • Choose button display style (block, inline)
  • Add breaks before and/or after the button
  • Custom styling option, adds a containing div with classname which you can style in your stylesheet (new since 1.1)
  • Button layout selection (horizontal, vertical, no count) (new since 1.3)

Expert options:

  • Disable the inclusion of OpenGraph properties. (You can disable this option if another plugin already includes the OG meta tags)

Language support:

  • Dutch
  • English
  • Romanian (provided by
